languages.text: "Тогда, гипотетически, со временем ей удалось бы компенсировать малую часть свершенных кощунств против Омниссии. Это было бы очень щедрым даром. Однако данный акт милосердия не рекомендован, ибо не заслужен".

"Then, hypothetically, in time she would be able to compensate for a small portion of the sacrileges she has committed against the Omnissiah. It would be a most generous gift. However, this act of mercy is not advisable, for it is undeserved."
languages.original_text: "Тогда, гипотетически, со временем ей удалось бы компенсировать малую часть свершенных кощунств против Омниссии. Это было бы очень щедрым даром. Однако данный акт милосердия не рекомендован, ибо не заслужен".

traits.locale_text: "Then, hypothetically, in time she would be able to compensate for a small portion of the sacrileges she has committed against the Omnissiah. It would be a most generous gift. However, this act of mercy is not advisable, for it is undeserved."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Then, hypothetically, in time she would be able to compensate for a small portion of the sacrileges she has committed against the Omnissiah. It would be a most generous gift. However, this act of mercy is not advisable, for it is undeserved."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Then, hypothetically, in time she would be able to compensate for a small portion of the sacrileges she has committed against the Omnissiah. It would be a most generous gift. However, this act of mercy is not advisable, for it is undeserved."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Then, hypothetically, in time she would be able to compensate for a small portion of the sacrileges she has committed against the Omnissiah. It would be a most generous gift. However, this act of mercy is not advisable, for it is undeserved."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «Hecho esto, hipotéticamente, con el tiempo será capaz de compensar una pequeña parte de los sacrilegios que ha cometido contra el Omnissiah. Sería un obsequio de lo más generoso. Sin embargo, no se recomienda proceder con este acto de misericordia, pues no ha sido merecido».
languages.original_text: "Then, hypothetically, in time she would be able to compensate for a small portion of the sacrileges she has committed against the Omnissiah. It would be a most generous gift. However, this act of mercy is not advisable, for it is undeserved."

traits.locale_text: «Hecho esto, hipotéticamente, con el tiempo será capaz de compensar una pequeña parte de los sacrilegios que ha cometido contra el Omnissiah. Sería un obsequio de lo más generoso. Sin embargo, no se recomienda proceder con este acto de misericordia, pues no ha sido merecido».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: 「そうすれば、仮定の話ではあるが、彼女はいずれ自分が万機神に対して犯した冒涜のほんの一部を償うことができるだろう。それ自体がもっとも寛大な贈り物となる。しかし、このような慈悲を与えるには分不相応であるため、そのような行為は得策ではない」
languages.original_text: "Then, hypothetically, in time she would be able to compensate for a small portion of the sacrileges she has committed against the Omnissiah. It would be a most generous gift. However, this act of mercy is not advisable, for it is undeserved."

traits.locale_text: 「そうすれば、仮定の話ではあるが、彼女はいずれ自分が万機神に対して犯した冒涜のほんの一部を償うことができるだろう。それ自体がもっとも寛大な贈り物となる。しかし、このような慈悲を与えるには分不相応であるため、そのような行為は得策ではない」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: “那么，假以时日，她将能够补偿她对欧姆尼塞亚所犯下的一小部分罪行。这会是一份非常慷慨的礼物。不过，这种仁慈的行为并不可取，因为她不值得如此大礼。”
languages.original_text: "Then, hypothetically, in time she would be able to compensate for a small portion of the sacrileges she has committed against the Omnissiah. It would be a most generous gift. However, this act of mercy is not advisable, for it is undeserved."

traits.locale_text: “那么，假以时日，她将能够补偿她对欧姆尼塞亚所犯下的一小部分罪行。这会是一份非常慷慨的礼物。不过，这种仁慈的行为并不可取，因为她不值得如此大礼。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « Puis, à terme, elle pourra éventuellement compenser une petite partie des sacrilèges qu'elle a commis à l'endroit de l'Omnimessie. Voilà qui ferait un cadeau des plus généreux. Mais un tel geste de miséricorde serait malavisé, car elle ne le mérite pas. »
languages.original_text: "Then, hypothetically, in time she would be able to compensate for a small portion of the sacrileges she has committed against the Omnissiah. It would be a most generous gift. However, this act of mercy is not advisable, for it is undeserved."

traits.locale_text: « Puis, à terme, elle pourra éventuellement compenser une petite partie des sacrilèges qu'elle a commis à l'endroit de l'Omnimessie. Voilà qui ferait un cadeau des plus généreux. Mais un tel geste de miséricorde serait malavisé, car elle ne le mérite pas. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Hypothetisch wäre sie dann mit der Zeit in der Lage, einen kleinen Teil ihrer Sakrilegien gegen den Omnissiah wiedergutzumachen. Es wäre ein äußerst großzügiges Geschenk. Dieser Akt der Gnade ist jedoch nicht zu empfehlen, denn er ist unverdient."
languages.original_text: "Then, hypothetically, in time she would be able to compensate for a small portion of the sacrileges she has committed against the Omnissiah. It would be a most generous gift. However, this act of mercy is not advisable, for it is undeserved."

traits.locale_text: "Hypothetisch wäre sie dann mit der Zeit in der Lage, einen kleinen Teil ihrer Sakrilegien gegen den Omnissiah wiedergutzumachen. Es wäre ein äußerst großzügiges Geschenk. Dieser Akt der Gnade ist jedoch nicht zu empfehlen, denn er ist unverdient."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.original_text: "Then, hypothetically, in time she would be able to compensate for a small portion of the sacrileges she has committed against the Omnissiah. It would be a most generous gift. However, this act of mercy is not advisable, for it is undeserved."

languages.text: "Varsayımsal olarak... Hermesih'e hürmetsizliklerinin küçük bir kısmı zaman içerisinde affedilebilir. Bu da son derece cömert bir hediye olur. Ancak böylesi bir merhamet eyleminde bulunulması tavsiye edilmemektedir. İlgili birim bunu hak etmemektedir."
languages.original_text: "Then, hypothetically, in time she would be able to compensate for a small portion of the sacrileges she has committed against the Omnissiah. It would be a most generous gift. However, this act of mercy is not advisable, for it is undeserved."

traits.locale_text: "Varsayımsal olarak, Hermesih'e karşı işlediği din dışı suçların küçük bir kısmı zaman içerisinde affedilebilir. Bu da son derece cömert bir hediye olur. Böylesi bir merhamet eyleminde bulunulması tavsiye edilmemektedir ama. Birim bunu hak etmemektedir."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
